page.title: 06Community Centre
page.content: The Community Centre is housed in Speyside High School and was opened in 1976. The centre has a community lounge, swimming pool, auditorium and games hall. Any of the classrooms in the school can be used as well. It has a lot of different activities such as gymnastics, carpet bowls, badminton, keep fit, youth club, swimming club, volleyball, etc. The swimming pool is used during the day by the schools and later by other groups. Around 750 people use the centre in an average week, quite a few of these from outside the area. The centre has two full-time community education workers and a full time pool supervisor. In all, it gives full or part-time employment to 15 people.
